name: Balloon to the top!
description:
Less Is More

Controls

Control the balloon using any of the following:

Left: left arrow, a (qwerty), q (azerty)

Right: left arrow, d (qwerty), d (azerty)

For the best experience, play in full screen and with the sound on.

Concept

For my first gamejam ever, I got inspired by the following video to make a short and sweet game:

Disclaimer

All the artwork and code is done by me. Music and sound effects were found on the internet.

Feel free to give any feedback, it's the best way to learn!
